name: Unable Trouble
description:
Title: Unable Trouble

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: What if you could be a ninja for the night? Being swift and creating trouble throughout the night but be careful: don't fall off the platforms. Move quickly and don't fall off or else it is game over! The longer you run the more your score grows! 

Instructions: Press the Up arrow key to Start the game; the enter/ Return key to Restart. The goal is to stay on the platform as long as you can! 

Game Design Team: Stephany Chisum – Game Designer
